descriptionlist.description: Install emojiport and the latest emojis in one package! Must have the poomstmart emojiport repo in your sources. I Used elements of the source of minimal hosts blocker to make this project.
This is the iOS 12 version. If you are on iOS 10/11, use the legacy version instead.

changelog.change: Updated emoji file (Now has all emojis from 13.2)
